page.description: SetSecurityApplicationPasswordSettings sets password options for the named security application that is in the current subscription.
page.prototype: .SetSecurityApplicationPasswordSettings as L (SecurityApplicationName as C, PasswordSettings as AlphaCloud::SubscriptionSecurityApplicationPasswordSettings)

argument.name: SecurityApplicationName
argument.description: The name of the security application to update.

argument.name: PasswordSettings
argument.description: A SubscriptionSecurityApplicationPasswordSettings object instance populated with desired values.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the function call succeeded and .f. if it failed. Look at the CallResult property to determine the cause of a failure.
